typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'excel',
	container: '1908input',
	fileName: 'heart_failure_clinical_records_dataset.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'heart_failure_clinical_records_',
	firstRowAsHeader: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(GenericName = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
